artist: Artist: David Hockney; Author: Jacob Ludwig Carl Grimm; Author: Wilhelm Carl Grimm; Translator: Heiner Bastian; Printer: P. Clement Print Shop, Amsterdam; Publisher: Petersburg Press, London and New York ,  in association with the Kasmin Gallery
creditline: Gift of Fay M. Gallus and Richard Sweet
description: bound book, with portfolio for loose prints and slipcase, all in blue leather; book has a combination of printed text and etchings
medium: Etchings (some with aquatint, drypoint, and soft-ground etching), and letterpress; bound volume
portfolio: From Six Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm
signed: on colophon page, in pencil: David Hockney | Ed A | 46/100
title: Six Fairy Tales from the Brothers Grimm
